void network.score.ScoreService.SubmitScore (int score)[inline]
Submits a user's score to a remote server.
Parameters
score
The score to be submitted.
This method creates an HTTP POST request to submit the provided score to a specified API endpoint. It utilizes an instance of HttpRequestFactory to create the request and sets the score data in JSON format. The request is executed asynchronously, and upon completion, the result is logged using Debug.Log. This method does not return any value and operates asynchronously, meaning that the calling thread will not be blocked while waiting for the response. Here is the caller graph for this function:
